title: Excel in C
description: Implementing data structures and algorithms with C to store and manage the content of a spreadsheet similarly to how you would in Microsoft Excel

title: Tile Matching
description: a simple puzzle game to find all matching pairs of coloured tiles on a randomized 4x4 grid

title: Dorm Security System
description: In hopes to reduce theft in residence a PIR sensor is used detect movement and notify the owner when triggered via a web app
